title: Goldenseed CEO Says Cannabis Market 'Insulated'
itunes:title: Goldenseed CEO Says Cannabis Market 'Insulated'
description:
Scott Goldie, CEO of Goldenseed, discusses his experience growing and selling legal marijuana. He says regulation is a big issue as the legal cannabis market in California is $3 billion, as opposed to an $8 billion black market.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
